sentences.en: Erase (? ): Destroy summon. High landing rate. Uses Spirit Ore.
sentences.cn: 抹去: 破坏召唤物, 高几率, 需要精灵矿.

sentences.en: Getting up, Alex savagely punched a bell push on the wall, knowing it would summon help.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯站起身, 粗暴地按了按墙上的电铃, 他知道一按电铃就会来人.

sentences.en: He could not summon ( up ) the courage to tell them about it.
sentences.cn: 他鼓不起勇气告诉他们那件事.

sentences.en: He had to summon more courage than he knew he had.
sentences.cn: 他必须要鼓起超乎自己所知的勇气.

sentences.en: He had to summon the energy to finish the race.
sentences.cn: 他不得不拼尽全力跑完比赛。

sentences.en: He pedaled off to summon a mason.
sentences.cn: 他骑脚踏车去叫泥瓦匠.

sentences.en: Hugh was summoned to appear before the magistrate.
sentences.cn: 休被传唤到地方法院出庭。

sentences.en: I really very want to summon you in this tranquil nighttime sky.
sentences.cn: 我真的很想在这宁静的夜空里呼唤你.

sentences.en: In that day I will summon my servant, Eliakim son of Hilkiah.
sentences.cn: 20到那日我必召我仆人希勒家的儿子以利亚敬来.

sentences.en: It took her a full month to summon the courage to tell her mother.
sentences.cn: 她用了整整一个月的时间才鼓起勇气告诉了母亲。

sentences.en: Meeting Stones now function similar to a Warlock Summon spell.
sentences.cn: 集合石现在的作用类似于术士的召唤法术(拉人).

sentences.en: Mr Rushworth, shall we summon a council on this lawn?
sentences.cn: 罗什渥兹先生, 我们就在这块草地上开个会 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: Robert summoned the waiter for the bill.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特召唤服务员结账。

sentences.en: Summon them right where you think the Stealth unit and presto!
sentences.cn: 把他们直接召唤到你认为有隐形单位的地方.

sentences.en: Summon Warriors – this will summon 3 signature warriors to help her.
sentences.cn: 召唤勇士—此技能可召唤3个次级精英勇士帮助她.

sentences.en: The oddest events will summon up memories.
sentences.cn: 那些非常稀奇古怪的事情会唤起人们的记忆。

sentences.en: To summon ( a devil or spirit ) by magical or supernatural power.
sentences.cn: 念咒召唤通过魔力或超自然力召唤 ( 魔鬼或神灵 )

sentences.en: Upon an exigency, local authorities shall summon militia to guard riverbanks immediately.
sentences.cn: 遇有紧急情形时, 地方主管机关应即发动民力,驻堤协防.

sentences.en: Wish of Tiamat Ti + Am + At Increases earth golem level. Increases summon demon level.
sentences.cn: 提阿玛之愿增加土系技能等级, 增加召唤魔鬼等级.

trans.tran_en: to order someone to come to a place

trans.tran_cn: 传唤，召唤，鼓起（勇气），传讯（出庭），[军]劝降，招降
trans.tran_en: to order someone to come to a place
